Directions: In a bowl, combine the oil, garlic powder and oregano; brush over both sides of eggplant. Grill, uncovered, over medium heat for 4 minutes on each side or until tender. To serve, spoon a small amount of salsa into the center of each; sprinkle with cheese.
Ingredients: 1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch slices
